mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.transaction_date,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time,COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.win_amount) winlose, SUM(d.commission_amount) validamount FROM ds_m8_sport d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.transaction_date,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT (case when COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 4200 END ) AS game_type, (case when COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 'h8体育' END ) AS game_name, (case when COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) END ) AS bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.win_amount) winlose, SUM(d.commission_amount) validamount FROM ds_m8_sport d
select count(*) as bet_count,sum(bet_amount) as betamount,sum(commission_amount) as validamount,sum(win_amount) as winlose from ds_m8_sport
mapper.sql: id, fetch_id, bet_id, site_id, username, bet_amount, win_amount, commission_amount, commission, result, last_modify_time, league, home, away, status, game, odds, side, info, half, transaction_date, workdate, matchdate, runscore, score, htscore, first_last_goal, sportstype, ip, create_time, update_time, league_name, away_name, home_name, flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ds_m8_sport
order by ${orderByClause}
